Html:
Hello,
I would to deploy a msu file (Microsoft hotfix for Windows 7).

Is it possible to deploy it with WPP ?

I tried with a powershell script and wsusa.exe command line, the update deployed, but my update was not deploy.

Thanks in advance for your reply

did you have EXE which include the Hotfix? If yes, try Windows-Key and R > "Path to Hotfix.exe" /? [ENTER] to get the silent parameters. Most of time it is /s for silent and some other switches more. This commandline switches you can use as commandline parameters in the update sequenz.
Can you see this thread if it meet your needs : Install MSU file

It works perfect !

Thanks for you powerful help !
